name: market for purse seiner, steel | purse seiner, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17944/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'purse seiner, steel', in the Global geography.;This market connects the supply chain of purse seiners, steel from their production till the place they are employed and used. No transportation is considered. Purse seiner, steel is a fishing vessel made out of (primarily) steel and is used as infrastructure to the relevant consumers that employ this type of fishing (seine).

Activity starts after the production of purse seiner, steel.

Activity ends with the provision of purse seiner, steel to its relevant consumers.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing

exchanges.description: Construction of a purse seiner, per 1000 kg of light ship weight (LSW). Regressions based on mainly primary data were created to relate the weight of each inventory item to a purse seiner's LSW. The list of inventory items (granularity) contribute >95% of environmental impacts, as described in the reference publication.
